recipesJson.name: Jam monster diyordie
recipesJson.author: Opalvapes
recipesJson.description:
Couldn't find the recipe on ATF for this remix that Wayne did. So here's his diyordie remix of strawberry jam monster.

This is a spot on of the strawberry jam monster.

reviews.text: This recipe is way to complicated for jam monster. If you really want jam monster just jack up strawberry jam with toast up 8% and super sweet up to like 3% and you will have your mix. That’s it. This recipe does no.t have that jammy note your looking for and that’s jam monster really jammy.

This is one of my favorite recipes thus far in my admittedly short time doing DIY. This is actually the recipe that got me interested in mixing because I was so intrigued by how this flavor profile was even possible and the only vape shop near me didn't actually sell Jam Monster. That said I'm not getting much toast note, just barely enough for the butter to be good with the strawberry jam. Like I said, one of my favorite recipes so far but I'd like Wayne to do a little more tweaking, maybe not so much a clone and more of a flavor profile accurate remix using some of the elements he used in this recipe. Maybe this is also the recipe that will really get me into adding my own flair too, as I would really like to see this one move a little further.
thanks for putting this up because we all know Wayne will never do it. I've had to pull up the video for reference too many times
